author: dleslie
msg: Bugzilla 7157. Updated Javadoc comment to note that the XPath.installFunction() method currently does not

author: sboag
msg: In mightBeProximate, there was a bug that assumed a variable would not be
be a numeric result.  It is now fixed to assume a number may be a number, which
may cause a small performance penalty.  In the future, it should be possible to
chase this down a bit more to rule out more variables as non-numbers.

author: sboag
msg: Use PropertyResourceBundle instead of ListResourceBundle, and put error
messages into property files, for easier localization.
